question: Which Indian state is set to depute 'Arogya Mitra' at Primary health centres to inform people about governmentâ€™s health-related schemes?
explanation:
The Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh Yogi Adityanath recently announced that one \'Arogya Mitra\' each is to be deputed at all Primary health centres in the state to inform people about health-related schemes of the government.
The Chief Minister also \'Kaushal Satrang\' programme of the Department of Vocational Education and Skill Development and Department of Labour and Employment Exchange. The programme is aimed at generating employment and self-employment opportunities for the youth of the state.
